part2.question:
Describe your perfect job. You should say:
What it is
Where you heard about it
What you need to learn to get the job
And explain why you think it is your perfect job.
part2.model_answer: My ultimate Dream job [理想的工作] is to be a pilot, which I think is an amazing career full of adventure and excitement. It is Fulfilling [令人满足的] but also very Demanding [要求高的] physically and mentally due to the long hours and responsibility. Since it is Prestigious [有声望的], I must be highly Qualified [合格的] in math and physics, although the training is incredibly Challenging [充满挑战的]. It is a Lucrative [赚钱的] way to Make a living [谋生] and support a future family comfortably. I am Adaptable [适应力强的] enough to Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上晋升] quickly and become a captain one day.

part2.question:
Describe a job you would like to have in the future. You should say:
What the job is
What qualifications are required
Whether it is a popular job
And explain why this job appeals to you.
part2.model_answer: It has been my lifelong ambition to become a doctor, which has always been my ultimate Dream job [理想的工作] since I was a small child. It is deeply Fulfilling [令人满足的] to help sick people recover from severe illness and return to their daily lives happily. Because it is Demanding [要求高的] and intellectually Challenging [充满挑战的], I must be highly Qualified [合格的] to practice it safely and effectively. It is a Prestigious [有声望的] and Lucrative [赚钱的] career choice in my country. I need to be Adaptable [适应力强的] to Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上晋升] and Make a living [谋生] while serving my community with care.

part2.question:
Describe a well-paid job that you would be good at. You should say:
What the job is
What skills you have that match this job
How you would find this job
And explain why you think you would succeed in this role.
part2.model_answer: I am confident that I would excel at sales because I am very persuasive and friendly with strangers I meet every single day. It is a Lucrative [赚钱的] way to Make a living [谋生] if you work hard every day to meet difficult targets and sales goals. Although it is Challenging [充满挑战的] to find new customers, I am Adaptable [适应力强的] and Qualified [合格的] for the task. It is my Dream job [理想的工作] because closing deals is very Fulfilling [令人满足的]. To Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上晋升] in a Prestigious [有声望的] firm is Demanding [要求高的] but totally worth it in the end.

part3.question: What jobs do children want to do when they grow up?
part3.model_answer: Opinion Generally speaking, children aspire to fun jobs like astronauts or superheroes because they seem exciting and full of daily adventure. Reason They don't yet care about practical things like Job security [工作保障] or salary to pay rent. Example Unless they grow up and face bills, they don't fear risks like Unemployment [失业] or poverty.

part3.question: What should people consider when choosing jobs?
part3.model_answer: Opinion It is crucial that they consider their own passion and internal Motivation [动力] first before simply choosing money or status symbols. Reason Doing something you love makes life much better than just working for cash every single day. Example If you hate your work, it becomes a depressing Dead-end job [没前途的工作] very quickly and sadly.

part3.question: Is salary the main reason people choose a certain job?
part3.model_answer: Opinion Undeniably, individuals primarily need to Bring home the bacon [养家糊口] to survive in the expensive city today. Reason Money pays essential bills like rent and food, which are getting more expensive these days for everyone. Example Although passion helps, a Prosperous [繁荣的] and comfortable life requires a steady and reliable cash flow.

part3.question: What kind of jobs are well-paid?
part3.model_answer: Opinion In the current market, technology roles usually pay very well due to high global demand for skilled computer programmers. Reason The rise of Automation [自动化] has created a huge need for skilled experts in every industry now. Example Provided that you Think outside the box [打破常规] and solve problems, you earn more money than others.

part3.question: Do people's ideal jobs change as they grow up?
part3.model_answer: Opinion As people mature, they tend to value stability and Work-life balance [工作生活平衡] more than energetic youth do these days generally. Reason Time with family becomes more precious than adventure or risk-taking as they age and settle down. Example Whereas teens want fame and travel, adults usually want peace and quiet at home with family.

part3.question: To what extent does technology (such as AI) threaten traditional job roles in modern society?
part3.model_answer: Opinion Regrettably, it causes potential Brain drain [人才流失] in manual sectors worldwide, which is worrying for workers. Reason Robots take jobs that used to employ millions of ordinary people in factories and large warehouses. Example Unless we adapt quickly to new tech, humans will lose out to machines in the job market.
